title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. L, pt. 4205 - Industrial Effectiveness Program-specialized Industrial Effectiveness Financial Assistance
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. L, pt. 4205

Statutory authority: Economic Development Law, §§ 190-196; N.Y.S. Urban Development Corporation Act, §§ 3, 10; Omnibus Economic

Development Act of 1987, § 7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
